Builds an object handling a tcp connection to one client. Sends the MJPEG header straight away

Parameters:

in - the input stream
out - the ouput stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error get in/output streams

updateControlValue

public static void updateControlValue(ControlList ctrlList,
                                      JPEGFrameGrabber fg,
                                      java.lang.String httpLine)
                               throws ControlException
Parses the given http line, expecting to find something along the lines of GET /control?id=ID&val=VAL&submit=set HTTP/1.1 where ID and VAL are integers.

Parameters:
ctrlList - the control list
httpLine - the http line to be parsed
Throws:
ControlException - if there is an error setting the new value
